-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A young bride in love is about to get married, but to be hit by a meteorite loaded with a powerful substance she begins to grow unusually.
Already giantess, she is captured by the U.S. government and meets some strange creatures, including a cockroach scientist, one geleca, the missing link and a mutant larva. The group is called to avoid an alien attack on the planet Earth.
Although the topic beaten and predictable, the animation is fun and even conquer the little peculiar traits. The many references to science fiction films and horror are calling more attention from grown older children who are following in the session.
And precisely this double achievement that is the problem of the film. For over once it gets in the way and do not hesitate to decide which is the public that must be reached. If the film is sometimes tiresome for adults, it is incomprehensible by other children.
But some jokes are priceless and the animation quality is indisputable. The characters could be more elaborate, but have a good presentation, and the film has a hint of feminism in their morale.
